title.rendered: Eldorado Outdoor Fireplace Showcased in Qualified Remodeler

content.rendered: Leading source for residential kitchen and bath design, Qualified Remodeler features Eldorado Stone’s Outdoor Wood-Burning Fireplace in the September 2013 issue. Under “Stone and Brick: Product Spotlight,” the Outdoor Wood-Burning Fireplace is spotlighted in full detail.
